data.text: @MeghanMcCain @sarahaines @michaelstrahan Best wishes for continued success.   You are the best ever.

@Jaynee61000439 @se49er @eaglepatty51 @MeghanMcCain @sarahaines @michaelstrahan You know I disagree with much of what she says, but I do like her a lot.    She is the best conservative who has been on the show,

@MeghanMcCain @sarahaines @michaelstrahan Oh, I will miss Sara Haines so much.   She is wonderful.   She is like everyone's favorite cheerleader in  high school.  A cheerleader who grew up to be a smart attractive woman.
@MeghanMcCain @sarahaines @michaelstrahan @sarahaines will definitely be missed.  You gave her a beautiful send off.  Looking forward to the new co-host, whoever that is.

@DanTavine @MeghanMcCain @sarahaines @michaelstrahan Whoopi takes pride in her uniqueness. Joy is brash, bold and confident. Sunny is smart as a whip, with a big heart. Meghan is relatively young & a little on edge. I seldom agreed with her Dad, but I respect him. Same with Meghan. She’ll be OK

Love being Canadian🇨🇦. Hate cost of medical to travel at states.

@MeghanMcCain @sarahaines @michaelstrahan I’m American born, living in Canada for almost 20 years. I love my healthcare and would hate to have to go back to a USA system.  That was a twisted spin today to put on us and I normally enjoy your perspective.  That one was uneducated, the numbers don’t back you up.

Until this year there has been some write-offs, however when we file next year we’re all going to get hit hard. I was born in raised in Ontario spent most of my career working there. The quality of life is far superior
